sections.heading: Act, how cited; terms, defined
sections.text: Sections 30-201 to 30-209 shall be known and may be cited as the Uniform Wills Recognition Act (1977).In the Uniform Wills Recognition Act (1977):(1) International will means a will executed in conformity with sections 30-202 to 30-205; and(2) Authorized person and per
